auth.password_error: Error during password verification, it may be that the content of the hash saved in the database does not correspond to the encryption algorithm used.
auth.user_disabled: The user account entered is disabled.
auth.wrong_user: The entered user is NOT found in the database.
auth.wrong_role_domain: The indicated domain and/or role are not assigned to the user.

file_upload.error_size: Error uploading file: The file size exceeds the allowed limit.

db.insert_error: An error occurred while inserting the element.
db.insert_error_log: Error trying to insert element log entry.
db.insert_duplicate: The element you are trying to insert already exists in the database with the _id:

db.id_referenced_empty: The ID of the referenced element cannot be empty.

db.update_duplicate: The element you are trying to update already exists in the database with the _id:

db.delete_id_no_results: No record was found to delete with the specified ID.
db.delete_rejected_dep: Deletion rejected, there are dependencies of the element to be deleted.
db.delete_empty_id: You must specify at least one _id for delete.
db.not_valid_fk: Any of the elements referenced as foreign is NOT valid
db.not_valid_objectid: Some of the referenced elements have an ObjectId that is NOT valid.

rabc.not_have_schema_permissions: The user does not have the necessary permissions on the schema:

ris.operation_not_allowed: Operation NOT allowed, the domain indicated from the JWT does NOT allow the desired operation.
ris.empty_domain_JWT: To check for a domain reference, the filter parameter can NOT be empty.
ris.duplicated_person: The person you are trying to insert already exists in the database.
ris.same_document: Unable to update entered information. There is already another person with the same document in the database.
ris.unavailable_slot: The indicated start and/or end is not available in the slot. Used by the appointment _id:
ris.wrong_date_format_slot: The format of the start and/or end datetime is wrong.
ris.only_urgency_slot: The appointment cannot be coordinated on an urgency slot unless it is an urgencies.
ris.study_iuid_error: There was some problem trying to generate the Study IUID:

ris.report_signed: The report you are trying to sign is already signed by the indicated user.

ris.mail_wrong_address: The email address indicated is incorrect.
ris.mail_empty_subject: The subject parameter cannot be empty.
ris.mail_wrong_file: The specified filename or base64 is wrong.
ris.procedure_not_found: Procedure not found with the specified _id.
ris.modalitiy_not_found: Modalitiy not found with the specified code value.

validate.delete_code_required: To remove an item you must specify the valid delete code.
validate.same_dates: The start date and the end date must be the same.
validate.start_date_lte_end_date: The start date must be less than the end date.
validate.start_time_lte_end_time: The start time must be less than the end time.
validate.weekday_boolean: The day of the week must be boolean [true, false].
validate.weekday_required: At least one day of the week must be true to apply the date range.
validate.time_format: The start or end time format is incorrect [Supported format: HH:MM (24h)].
validate.urgency_boolean: The urgency parameter must be boolean [true, false].
validate.valid_permission: You must enter at least one valid permission to the user.
validate.fk_slot_required: The fk_slot parameter must be specified (it is required for the operation).
validate.pet_coef_required: PET-CT procedures require coefficient for the calculation of the dose.

validate.service_invalid_ObjectId: The service parameter is not a valid ObjectId.
validate.role_NaN: The role parameter is NOT a numeric value or is NOT within the valid role numbers.
